230100: Birth is exhausted, the holy life has been lived out, what can be done is done, of this there is no more beyond

150731: Breath of life, stream of death
170100: Loud splashes the brook but the oceans depth are calm

210100: If you truly seek peace, your blade will only hurt the evil
